title: An Act relative to property tax classifications in the city of Watertown for fiscal year 2027 and subsequent fiscal years

abstracts.abstract: By Representatives Owens of Watertown and Lawn of Watertown, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Steven Owens (with the approval of the city council) relative to property tax classifications in the city of Watertown for fiscal year 2027 and subsequent fiscal years.  Revenue.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
Reported, referred to the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Revenue

related_entities.name: committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Revenue
the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Revenue

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 01/27/2026 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1 & A-2
